About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Hello, I'm Tiffany, a Front-End Developer based in Chicago, specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional, high-performing websites and applications. After graduating from Chicago State University with a B.S in Computer Science, I made journey into Web development. I enjoy the merge of being creative and technical. One of the most valuable assets that I can provide to your company is the ability to be molded to your stack.

Computer Science

I was exposed to programming after enrolling in an 'Intro to C++'' course in college, and coding quickly became a passion. Studying Computer Science gave me the tools to developed the critical thinking skills that are required for the the field

Front End Developer

Creating responsive web apps that allow accessibility and the best viewing experience across all devices is my specialty. My knowledge of multiple fields allows me to work on a project with the full scope in mind; to produce a more cohesive experience user experience.

HTML Email Developer

PSD to HTML emails tested on numerous email clients using Litmus, Email On Acid & real devices.

Here's a few technologies I've been working with recently:

  • HTML & CSS/SASS
  • JavaScript (ES6+)
  • React + Redux
  • Node.js + Express
  • MongoDB
  • MySQL
  • BootStrap
  • git
